remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的功能类似于文本字符串, 用户可以使用它来解释它们引用的控件。The property functions similar to a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to. 请确保中的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]所有控件都有文本表示形式, 以便能够以编程方式引用控件。Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool IsOffscreenCore() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function IsOffscreenCore () As Boolean

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与此 关联的 是否不在屏幕上。

span.span: if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不指示元素是否可见。This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情况下, 元素位于屏幕上, 但仍不可见。In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible. 例如, 如果元素位于屏幕上, 但被其他元素遮盖, 则它可能不可见。For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible. 在这种情况下, `false`该方法将返回。In this case the method returns `false`.
